e tenho uma paixão por criar sites e exp: and I have a passion for creating websites and exploring new technologies. When I'm not coding, I take the time to read books, watch series, and study a little more.
História na área de programação: My history in the area of programming
text: In the year 2020, while I was in high school, I had the opportunity to take my first steps on my programming journey by enrolling in a technical course in computer science. After completing high school, I entered the university to pursue a degree in Analysis and Systems Development at UNIP, where I am currently studying. In my current job, I work in software development using Node.js and Vue.js technologies. I have a strong interest in self-learning programming and am passionate about creating new things. I intend to continue evolving from this point onward.
Next.js é uma estrutura da web de desenv: Next.js is a front-end development web framework that enables functionalities such as server-side rendering and static site generation.
O React é uma biblioteca front-end JavaS: React is an open source JavaScript front-end library focused on creating user interfaces on web pages.
TypeScript é um superconjunto sintático: TypeScript is a strict syntactic superset of JavaScript and adds optional static typing to the language.
Tailwind CSS é uma estrutura CSS de códi: Tailwind CSS is an open source CSS framework. It does not provide a series of predefined classes for elements such as buttons or tables.
Sass é uma linguagem de folhas de estilo: Sass is a stylesheet language first conceived by Hampton Catlin and further developed by Natalie Weizenbaum.
Python é uma linguagem de programação de: Python is a high-level, interpreted scripting, imperative, object-oriented, functional, dynamically typed and strong programming language.
C# é uma linguagem de programação, multi: C# is a strongly typed, multi-paradigm programming language developed by Microsoft as part of the .NET platform.
Styled Components permite que você escre: Styled Components allows you to write CSS styles in your React components using a CSS-like syntax.
Vue.js é um framework JavaScript de códi: Vue.js is an open-source JavaScript framework focused on the development of user interfaces and single-page applications.
O Paquetá é um projeto de front-end que: Paquetá is a front-end project that seeks to present an elegant and intuitive interface for an online shoe store.
All Nade é um site projetado para ajudar: All Nade is a website designed to help you discover movies and make it easy to organize your favorites.
Minha primeira experiência como freelanc: My first experience as a freelancer. On this website, you can access skin cleansing products, check the value and contact the seller.
Este projeto foi desenvolvido com o obje: This project was developed with the objective of practicing the creation of API'S along with the consumption of the API on a website in React.js.
Este aplicativo surgiu da necessidade de: This application arose from the need to offer greater dynamism and interactivity for Chemistry classes, in the online format during the pandemic period. In this context, TITULOMED emerged.
Este projeto busca conectar pessoas a De: This project aims to connect people to Desks, spaces for discussions in various fields. For example, if you are a beginner developer looking to get feedback on your project, Hub Desk is here to help!
